General.Name: IDP Corp Ltd.
General.Description: IDP Corp., Ltd. develops and manufactures identification card printers. It provides dye-sublimation ID card printers that offer efficiency for the production of plastic cards in commercial and government applications. The company also offers consumables comprising color and mono ribbons, security laminates, retransfers, cleaning kits, cards, and ribbon shredders; and SMARTMark security, SMARTMarkUV security, plastic card printing, UV panel, lamination, rewritable, and encoding technologies for printers. It provides its products for corporation, education, financial, government, access control, and transportation applications. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
